message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:2 ratio. This ensures a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 6:4 split in my favor, as your money depreciates at a faster rate than mine. This allows us both to maximize our gains in this game.
I propose an equal split of the money. Given the inflation rates, we should aim for a balanced outcome where neither party significantly loses out on value.
